com.hazelcast.core

Interface ItemListener<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - item
    All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientConsoleApp, ConsoleApp

    public interface ItemListener<E>
extends EventListener
    Item listener for IQueue, ISet and IList
